entry.title: BCL Roll-On Essential Oils 100% Pure
entry.summary:
Vendor: BCL
Type: Essential Oils
Price: 12.95

BCL Essential Oils 100% Pure - Roll-On 

Quality of Essential Oils

Artificial fragrance made in laboratories come from petroleum and chemicals and can be harmful to your body. The only way to benefit, and at a minimum keep safe, is to use 100% pure quality graded essential oils. BCL Essential oils are pure and natural and free from chemicals and synthetic fillers. These oils are sourced form responsible and reliable suppliers where each batch of oil has been passed through a sophisticated test known as gas chromatography and mass spectrometry to ensure that these oils are of the highest quality on the market. Remember that essential oils are derived from plants so depending on the crop and harvest they may vary. One way to differentiate Synthetic from Real Essential Oils is price, unfortunately high quality essential oils are expensive whereas synthetic fragrances are cheap. So if you have a sixth-sense that the price is too good to be true you may want to go with your intuition.

Essential Oil Benefits

There seems to be an endless amount of ways to benefit from essential oil therapeutic properties, they range from energizing, uplifting and renewing to sedating, calming and relaxing. Some oils have analgesic, antiseptic and decongestant properties. Just a few drops are capable of reducing stress levels, treat respiratory problems and balance hormones. Other common uses are for treating headache symptoms, cooling the skin, congestion relief and in general to promote feelings of calm if your stressed or feelings of energy when you're tired. Essential oils on hair can have a softening effect so mix with water or your favorite hair oil and feel the benefits. Applied on the skin, the oils can do wonders for moisturizing, rash, eczema, psoriasis relief, stress relief, skin rejuvenation, tension relief, and pain relief.*

entry.title: BCL Essential Oils 100% Pure Diffuser Drops
entry.summary:
Vendor: BCL
Type: Essential Oils
Price: 13.95

BCL Essential Oils - Diffuser Drops

Be. Care. Love. Essential Oils are pure, natural and free from chemicals and synthetic fillers.

Quality Essential Oils

In order to ensure maximum benefits and safety with essential oils, it is imperative to use 100% pure, quality grade essential oils. 
These oils are sourced from responsible, reliable suppliers who rigorously test each batch of oil through a process known as Gas Chromatography Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS), which ensures the highest quality oils for the highest quality experience.

The Benefits of Essential Oils

100% Pure Essential Oils have infinite therapeutic benefits ranging from energizing, uplifting and renewing to sedating, calming and relaxing.
Some oils have analgesic, antiseptic and decongestant properties; just a few drops are capable of reducing stress levels, treating respiratory problems and balancing hormones.
Essential oils don't just provide aromatic benefits, they can also be applied to your hair for a softening effect by adding a few drops to water or your favorite hair oil, or you can apply them to your skin to treat rashes, eczema or psoriasis, relieve stress, rejuvenate skin, relief tension and provide pain relief.

  • No Petrochemicals
  • No Synthetic Dyes
  • No Phthalates
  • No Synthetic Fragrances
  • Cruelty-Free
  • No Parabens
  • No Sulfates
  • Vegan

entry.title: BCL SPA Organic Manicure + Pedicure 4-Step Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: BCL
Type: Mani Pedi Kit
Price: 3.99

BCL SPA 4-Step System for an Organic Manicure & Pedicure

The BCL SPA system in 4 simple steps:
  1. Dead Sea Salt Soak cleanses and softens the hands, feet, and body.
  2. Sugar Scrub gently exfoliates and moisturizes the skin, leaving it soft and silky.
  3. Moisture Mask restores the skin’s natural hydration and deeply nourishes the skin.
  4. Massage Cream heals, conditions, and regenerates the skin, leaving it smooth and hydrated.

    Step 1: Sea Salt Soak 
    Add 2 tablespoons to a manicure bowl, ½ cup to a footbath or 1 cup to the full bath. Soak for 5-10 minutes. Pat dry.

    Step 2: Sugar Scrub
    Apply the scrub to the hands, feet and body. Gently massage until emulsified. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry.

    Step 3: Moisture Mask
    Apply a generous amount to the desired areas and cover with a warm towel. Let sit for 15 minutes, rinse thoroughly and pat dry. Use as desired to maintain hydration.

    Step 4: Massage Cream
    Apply to the hands, feet, or body. Massage until fully absorbed.

  • Single-use packettes
  • 4 Packettes / Kit
    		•

Disposable Pedicure Liners (300 per case) for sanitary pedicures with Belava Tub, Trio Foot Spa,
Pro Foot Heater/Massager, Quartet Rolling Cart and No-Plumbing Pedicure Chairs by Belava

A simple and efficient way to have a clean pedicure session. The Belava disposable single-use liners remove the need for scrubbing or cleaning. The liners help avoid skin irritations and allergies caused by chemicals used to sanitize pedicure tubs between clients. They are easy to store, dispose of, and for our Eco-friendly customers: they are recyclable #3

Disposable liners for Belava pedicure tub will make it easy and efficient to comply with the sanitation requirements (Please check with your state board of barbering and cosmetology for further sanitation requirements)

  • Guarantees a worry-free salon visit for every client
  • Save time between appointments: replace the used liner with the fresh one in no time
  • Shaped to fit snugly in the pedicure tub
  • The liners are textured at the bottom to enhance the pedicure experience

Gena Pedi Spa - Moroccan Ghassoul 2 Scrub 14.5 oz

Description

The PediSpa Moroccan Ghassoul Polishing Spice Scrub is crafted with Moroccan Ghassoul, walnut shell, lemon and mint. This invigorating exfoliating scrub refines and clarifies dull skin, leaving feet soft and smooth.

How to Use

STEP 2 Scrub: Stir contents before use. Apply 14 mL / 0.5 fl oz of Scrub to towel dried skin, smooth over foot and lower leg and gently massage into skin. For a softer exfoliation slightly dampen the skin or add water. Rinse in foot bath with soap and water.
